name: XD - A Prototype
description:
CONTROLS:

 WASD to move (One direction at a time at the moment, but I'll fix it)

L and R ARROW KEYS to ROTATE CAMERA (will get to vertical rotation)

NUMBER KEYS 1-3 TO SWITCH BETWEEN ITEMS

[G] to CREATE STACK of BRICKS / THROW GRENADE

Q  & E move you UP & DOWN respectively

It's a buggy mess because it's a prototype - but it's my prototype. My first ever :) Tips or suggestions open I guess. Made on a laptop that won't even run it.
